comments.body: Why don't you also change `cacert_path` (one above)? Also, now the types differ from the ones here: https://github.com/ansible/ansible/blob/devel/lib/ansible/module_utils/docker/common.py#L83-L85

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +55,59 @@            - If the value is not specified in the task and the environment variable C(DOCKER_CERT_PATH) is set,
              the file C(cert.pem) from the directory specified in the environment variable C(DOCKER_CERT_PATH) will be used.
        type: path
        aliases: [ tls_client_cert ]
    key_path:
